attributes.action: TV stations to agree one weekend per month free of charity and begging campaigns
attributes.background: We are endlessly bombarded by charity campaigners begging for money. We deserve a complete break from this begging and one weekend per month does not seem like too much to ask for. All TV companies must observe the same weekend to give us some peace and quiet.

rejection.details: This petition is calling on TV companies, not the Government or Parliament, to take action.
